about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi there! I'm Olga, a passionate Frontend Engineer based in Sydney. I specialize in creating beautiful, responsive web applications using React and Vue.js. With a keen eye for design and a love for clean code, I bring ideas to life through modern web technologies. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring Sydney's amazing coffee scene or diving into the latest frontend trends.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey in software development

achievements: Developed a web app with annual membership system and event registration powered by Stripe integration, supporting 20+ events and thousands of members
Introduced GraphQL Code Generator to automate type-safe API integration, reducing manual sync errors and accelerating frontend development
Built a Slack-integrated EC2 management tool using AWS Lambda and API Gateway, enabling non-engineers to manage servers and reducing costs by preventing idle usage
Facilitated brainstorming sessions with state leaders to shape product roadmaps
Ran 20+ A/B tests in collaboration with PMs, designers, and backend engineers to improve client page performance, achieving up to 20% increase in conversion rates
Built one-click auto-refund feature, improving turnaround time and handling 200+ refunds weekly
Refactored and modularized the components in the landing page, reducing template code size by over 40% and simplifying future updates across regions
Integrated ad tracking SDKs to report key user events (e.g., purchase), enabling accurate conversion attribution for campaigns reaching 50K+ MAUs
Led biweekly tech sharing sessions with FE team to promote best practices (e.g., Dark Theme, PR Train)

playlistCoverGenerator.title: Playlist Cover AI Generator
playlistCoverGenerator.description: A web application that generates unique cover art for Spotify playlists using AI. Create stunning, personalized playlist covers with just a few clicks!

queenSelectShop.title: Queen Select Shop
queenSelectShop.description: A modern e-commerce platform built with React and TypeScript, featuring Redux for state management and Stripe integration for secure payments.

sweetTraveling.title: Sweet Traveling
sweetTraveling.description: A beautiful travel website showcasing destinations with smooth animations and modern design using advanced SCSS techniques.

monsterChatroom.title: Monster Chatroom
monsterChatroom.description: A real-time chat application built with React and Socket.io, featuring AI-powered chatbots and modern messaging interface.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together on your next project
